programme.title: 38 попугаев
programme.desc: Веселые истории о забавных приключениях четырех друзей — болтливой Мартышки, застенчивого Слоненка, разумного Попугая и задумчивого Удава.

programme.title: Весёлый грузовичок Олли
programme.desc: Олли — маленький веселый грузовичок, который только начинает познавать мир. По повадкам он очень похож на задорного любознательного щенка. Вместе со своими друзьями Олли нередко оказывается в переделках, решает непростые задачки, а также растет и развивается с юным зрителем.

programme.title: Возвращение блудного попугая
programme.desc: Мультик про попугая Кешу, который убежал от Вовки и решил жить самостоятельно.

programme.title: Приключения Тимми
programme.desc: "Маленький барашек Тимми, вместе со своими юными друзьями с фермы, отлично проводит время в детском саду, под надзором доброй цапли Гарриет и мудрого Филина Осборна. Там он учится многим хорошим вещам, в том числе и хорошему поведению. Немного упрямый и озорной Тимми может иногда напроказничать, но воспитатели всегда укажут ему на его ошибки и Тимми больше никогда не будет их повторять. О похождениях этого сорванца и будет идти речь в данном мультфильме."

programme.title: Приключения дельфиненка
programme.desc: Милый и добрый дельфиненок Муму живет на маленьком необитаемом острове, на который, время от времени, попадают разные смешные животные, которые становятся его друзьями. В гостях у Муму побывают модный краб и юная тюлениха, рыба-прилипала и электрическая птица, огромная раковина и многие другие. Это очень добрые и талантливые истории, сделанные с помощью самых современных средств 3D анимации, для самых маленьких и не только.

programme.title: Маша и Медведь
programme.desc: Маша — невероятно активная девочка, которая никогда не сидит на месте и считает, что весь мир создан для неё одной. Машина индивидуальность не знает границ, поэтому урок труда легко оборачивается строительством парусного корабля, а набор художника — в разукрашивание всего леса.

programme.title: Пингвин
programme.desc: Маленький, непоседливый пингвин по имени Пингу, вечно попадает в разного рода неприятности. Из-за своего любопытства, упрямости и непослушания, эти неприятности, зачастую, перерастают в настоящие беды. Но после того, как из неприятностей и бед ему помогает выбраться семья и друзья, он понимает что к чему и больше не совершает допущенных им ошибок. Этот мультфильм наглядный пример поговорки, в которой говорится: "на ошибках учатся"

programme.title: Желтик
programme.desc: О приключения цыпленка Желтика.

programme.title: Эскимоска
programme.desc: Главные герои ежедневно ловят рыбу и всегда умудряются найти какой-то предмет, который начинают изучать

programme.title: Маша и Медведь
programme.desc: Маша — невероятно активная девочка, которая никогда не сидит на месте и считает, что весь мир создан для неё одной. Машина индивидуальность не знает границ, поэтому урок труда легко оборачивается строительством парусного корабля, а набор художника — в разукрашивание всего леса.

programme.title: Влюбчивая ворона
programme.desc: Появилась в лесу смешная, но прелестная влюбчивая ворона. Восхитилась Зайцем: "Глаза у тебя не косые, а раскосые…"; влюбилась в Волка, и тот забыл свои болезни; увлеклась Медведем… Перессорились звери из-за внимания Вороны и … выгнали ее из леса. А потом загрустили. Но Ворона вернулась! И не одна…

programme.title: Шайбу! Шайбу!
programme.desc: Хоккейный матч между зазнавшимися "мастерами" и дружной командой новичков завершается, конечно, победой скромных и самоотверженных маленьких хоккеистов.

programme.title: Пингвин
programme.desc: Маленький, непоседливый пингвин по имени Пингу, вечно попадает в разного рода неприятности. Из-за своего любопытства, упрямости и непослушания, эти неприятности, зачастую, перерастают в настоящие беды. Но после того, как из неприятностей и бед ему помогает выбраться семья и друзья, он понимает что к чему и больше не совершает допущенных им ошибок. Этот мультфильм наглядный пример поговорки, в которой говорится: "на ошибках учатся"

programme.title: Маша и Медведь
programme.desc: Маша — невероятно активная девочка, которая никогда не сидит на месте и считает, что весь мир создан для неё одной. Машина индивидуальность не знает границ, поэтому урок труда легко оборачивается строительством парусного корабля, а набор художника — в разукрашивание всего леса.

programme.title: Малыши
programme.desc: В параллельном мире живут такие странные создания которые называют себя малышами, они не совсем похожи на человеческих детей потому что больше напоминают животных. Среди них есть зебра, лев, лягушка и другие животные, у них у каждого свой индивидуальный характер и поэтому она частенько ссорятся потому что не сходятся во мнениях. Но когда они перестают ругаться то начинаются самые увлекательные и захватывающие приключения которые только можно придумать. Эти малыши иногда заглядывают и к нам в мир чтобы позвать нас вместе с ними прогуляться по загадочным лугам и просто весело провести время.

programme.title: Эскимоска
programme.desc: Главные герои ежедневно ловят рыбу и всегда умудряются найти какой-то предмет, который начинают изучать

programme.title: Привет, Китти
programme.desc: "Замечательные мультфильмы серии Вместе с Hello Kitty научат малышей принимать ванну перед сном, правильно разговаривать по телефону, самим одеваться. Веселая музыка и яркие персонажи не оставят равнодушными малышей, а и их родители успеют отдохнуть, пока дети находятся ""в гостях"" у Китти!"

programme.title: Барашек Шон
programme.desc: Мирная жизнь маленькой овцефермы оказывается под угрозой, когда в результате очередной проказы неутомимого Барашка Шона хозяин фермы попадает в большой город. Вдоволь навеселившись полной свободой и безнаказанностью, Шон и остальное стадо барашков начинают волноваться за Фермера и решают отправиться на его спасение. Замаскировавшись под людей, они едут в большой город, где их ждет самое весёлое и эпическое приключение всей жизни

programme.title: Пингвин
programme.desc: Маленький, непоседливый пингвин по имени Пингу, вечно попадает в разного рода неприятности. programme.title: Приключения на волшебном острове
programme.desc: Прекрасная девочка Океана живет на райском острове вместе со своим дедушкой наставником. Другие дети постоянно дразнят ее за то, что у нее нет родителей. Из-за этого Океане становится грустно и одиноко, но она постепенно учится быть сильной и независимой. В этом ей помогает ее ум и хорошее чувство юмора. Океана не подозревает о своем прошлом, в котором была добрая фея, пираты и злой колдун. Ее мир переворачивается с ног на голову, когда колдун находит на дне океана магический кристальный шар. С его помощью колдун хочет захватить остров, и только Океана может его остановить. Герои этого мультфильма перенесут Вас в волшебный мир и с каждым новым эпизодом вы погрузитесь в атмосферу увлекательных приключений и веселых историй.

Die Trying
programme.desc: National Geographic Channel follows an adventurer on his mission to find microbial life forms in a firestorm burning at the bottom of a crater in Turkmenistan. This giant natural gas fissure has been flaming out of control for over four decades and no one knows if life can exist under these conditions. To find out, the expedition leader will don a fireproof suit, lower into the fiery pit and collect soil samples. He hopes his findings will give science a better understanding of microorganisms and help the political leaders in Turkmenistan figure out a way to quell the massive flames.

programme.title: Die Trying
programme.desc: National Geographic Channel follows an extreme rock climber as he attempts to set a record by free soloing a trio of harrowing cliffs without any safety lines. One of climbing's most decorated prodigies, Alex Honnold, must scale the face of Yosemite's Triple Crown, Mt. Watkins, The Nose and the Regular Half Face of Half Dome in less than 24 hours. It is a route that totals almost 7000 feet of sheer cliff where one slip means certain death.

programme.title: Banged Up Abroad
programme.desc: Overwork and a party lifestyle leave Michael Singh with a failed marriage and a deep depression. When an old friend offers him a job smuggling cocaine, Michael jumps at the chance. He makes it his new career, but soon finds himself in too deep. 21-year-old Christina Jocko is addicted to partying, but her discovery of opiates sends her over the edge. After losing her job, smuggling cocaine seems like a way out – but it leads to disaster.

programme.title: Banged Up Abroad
programme.desc: Banged Up Abroad is a British docudrama television series following stories of people who have been arrested while travelling abroad. It seems like you are watching a blood-freezing thriller, except for it is based on real events and real people. You'll see how a trip to paradise can turn into hell and end up in prison in an unknown country and it will make your hair stand. People get into troubles for trying to smuggle drugs, sometimes they are kidnapped or captured. The series is a mixture of interviews with the real people and actors reconstructing the events. We find out what it is like to be in prison abroad, without help and money, not knowing the language, and what are the terrible consequences for the family members. The series is a warning for all careless tourists, it shows vividly how easy and fast it is to hit rock bottom.

programme.title: Dead End Express
programme.desc: Throughout America's wilderness still lives a rare breed of off-the-grid individuals, dotted across the country in locations as secluded as they are serene. But not everything can be sourced from nature, and these untamed Americans sometimes require a helping hand, whether requiring medicine, food, or fuel. Delivering the goods to these remote individuals are a determined team of men, who reach those in need by bush plane, powerboat, packhorse, snowmobile or dogsled, going above and beyond to ensure their clients get their amenities, venturing to locations no other soul would dare. Documentary series.

programme.title: Dead End Express
programme.desc: Throughout America's wilderness still lives a rare breed of off-the-grid individuals, dotted across the country in locations as secluded as they are serene. But not everything can be sourced from nature, and these untamed Americans sometimes require a helping hand, whether requiring medicine, food, or fuel. Delivering the goods to these remote individuals are a determined team of men, who reach those in need by bush plane, powerboat, packhorse, snowmobile or dogsled, going above and beyond to ensure their clients get their amenities, venturing to locations no other soul would dare. Documentary series.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: The Science of Stupid is a whacky British science show that looks at some of the most watched videos on the internet and explains the science behind them. Initially hosted by Top Gear's Richard Hammond, and later by Dallas Campbell, this National Geographic is a comedic gem. With the first series airing episodes titled Cannon Ball Ice Dude, Learning to Fly, Jet Pack Failure and Dancing Disaster, you can guarantee that this is one of the most ridiculous shows on television. What more could you want?

programme.title: Made in a Day
programme.desc: At the heart of every community, is a firehouse; at the heart of that firehouse are the firefighters who put their lives on the line 24/7. The warhorse that carries them in to battle is the iconic fire truck. There are nearly 250,000 fire trucks worldwide. This is the story of how America's favorite ones are made.

programme.title: Made in a Day
programme.desc: In the series exploring cutting-edge manufacturing in an inter-connected world, OneWeb Satellites in Florida spill the beans on how they're making the world's first mass-produced satellites. A combination of space vehicle designers, manufacturing engineers and robotics come together to build and launch web satellites into space, providing internet to almost every part of the globe.

programme.title: Mega Breakdown
programme.desc: Yankee Stadium – home to the New York Yankees for over eight decades, and host to thirty-seven World Series – is about to be demolished. It's a mega job, with mega challenges. But the first task at hand is saving parts of the stadium. Everything from the seats…to the sod will be sold. When the memorabilia salvage is over, the teams get straight to work at clearing out the stadium of anything that's not part of structure. From kitchen equipment, to light bulbs, to the famous outfield frieze …it's all got to go. Then, the final breakdown. With an army of mega machines, the demo teams must systematically rip and strip-out the first two-tiers of seating until the stadium's nothing but a skeleton….then pull it down. But they're working within feet of a subway system that won't stop running. There's no room for error, and the job starts now.

programme.title: Mega Breakdown
programme.desc: In the intense glare of the Texas sun, a team of demolition experts attempt to cut down and recycle the Navy's "first and finest fast attack oiler," the U.S.S. Savannah AOR-4. This tough tanker ran fuel between the ships of the fleet for over 20 years. But now, she's making her final voyage to ESCO Marine, a sprawling scrap yard in the Southern most tip of Texas. Here, she'll be stripped down, gutted out and recycled. But the "Savy Sue" comes with an awful lot of challenges for ESCO owner Richard Jaross and his team. Asbestos, PCBs, and a decade of neglect make this once proud tanker one big mess.

programme.title: 80s Greatest
programme.desc: The 1980s were witness to some of the World's most devastating disasters. From the Space Shuttle Challenger, to the Chernobyl meltdown to the disaster in Bhopal, the 80s Greatest Tragedies shines a light on some of the decades darkest moments in order to illuminate some of the important lessons learnt.

programme.title: 80s Greatest
programme.desc: The 80s Greatest… offers a challenging and stimulating view of one of history's most enigmatic periods, shining a light on the people and events that shaped the decade while illuminating the trends that helped design our future

programme.title: The '90s: The Decade That Connected Us
programme.desc: The '90s were a decade of highs and lows.Bill Clinton swept into the United States Presidential office on the promise of change; viewers made new "Friends"; civil war rocked Rwanda; a notorious Colombian drug lord was taken down, and MTV's "The Real World" changed the television programming landscape.It was a time when technology accelerated us into our digital future, and a time when billionaires were created faster than ever before.With a star-studded cast of actors, eyewitnesses, politicians and celebrity interviewees, The 90s: The Decade That Connected Us tells the story of 10 years before boom turned into bust; 10 years when the Web was wide open; 10 years before global terror hit hard.

programme.title: The '90s: The Decade That Connected Us
programme.desc: The '90s were a decade of highs and lows.Bill Clinton swept into the United States Presidential office on the promise of change; viewers made new "Friends"; civil war rocked Rwanda; a notorious Colombian drug lord was taken down, and MTV's "The Real World" changed the television programming landscape.It was a time when technology accelerated us into our digital future, and a time when billionaires were created faster than ever before.With a star-studded cast of actors, eyewitnesses, politicians and celebrity interviewees, The 90s: The Decade That Connected Us tells the story of 10 years before boom turned into bust; 10 years when the Web was wide open; 10 years before global terror hit hard.

programme.title: Access 360° World Heritage
programme.desc: In Tanzania, East Africa, one of the worlds most iconic mountains is on the verge of catastrophe. Mount Kilimanjaro is losing the iconic white cap that has crowned its peak for millennia. Its glaciers are disappearing at an astonishing pace while its rivers and forests are drying up. Is it global warming, or a problem much closer to home? A passionate team of Tanzanians brave savannah, mountain and skies in a mission to uncover the mystery behind the demise of this national treasure and try to prevent it.

programme.title: Access 360° World Heritage
programme.desc: In a remote part of Central Turkey sits an alien landscape that may soon disappear. The World Heritage site of Cappadocia attracts more than 2 million visitors a year who come here not just for the beauty of the terrain, but also for the thousand year old cultural treasures hidden in its caves. We follow the Director of Museums of Cappadocia as he battles both man-made and natural erosion to protect this geological wonderland.

programme.title: Superstructures: Engineering Marvels
programme.desc: The series that reveals the extraordinary achievements and levels of engineering that went into some of the most incredible structures in the world. From the world's tallest building – the Burj Khalifa, ultimate cargo ships to the Volkswagen factory in Wolfsburg, Germany – the world's largest car plant and more. Each of these superstructures is broken down and analysed using CGI technology to provide an insight into the minds, workings and transformations of these incredible engineering marvels and how they went from the design board to reality.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim Shaw, a car enthusiast and TV presenter teams up with master mechanic Fuzz Townshend to rescue rusty old cars and classic vehicles from their former neglected lives. People can nominate a relative or friend without them knowing if they've been unable to restore the car themselves for any reason from medical issues to financial problems. A team of experts work hard to restore the vehicles to their former glory and once they have been revamped the owner is surprised with a reunion, usually at a staged event organised by Tim Shaw.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.

programme.title: Ultimate Supercar
programme.desc: A must see for petrolheads and connoisseurs, this series takes the viewer behind the scenes at some of the most legendary automobile manufacturers on the planet to reveal how their supercars are designed, engineered and constructed. From the DBS Superleggera of the last truly independent marque, Aston Marton, to Ferrari's best-selling Portofino and from rapper's favourite, the Bentley Continental GT. to the over-the-top Lamborghini Aventador SVJ, we learn what makes these beautiful machines unique and how it is the small, individual engineering secrets that make all the difference and ensure their mythical status and economic success.

programme.title: Ultimate Supercar

programme.title: Primal Survivor
programme.desc: Join survival and wilderness expert Hazen Audel as he pushes his skills to the limit in a series of challenging adventures around the globe. This documentary series tracks Hazen's exploits following the road less travelled where the terrain and elements can prove to be harsh and unstable. Along the way, he visits local communities and quizzes the native residents about the surrounding territory to help him on his arduous journey. Episodes feature such rigorous expeditions as following in the footsteps of the Embera tribe of Panama and Colombia to trek through the jungle of the Darien Gap; navigating the Arctic Circle accompanied by 200 reindeer; and traversing lakes infested with crocodiles.

programme.title: Primal Survivor

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay: Uncharted
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay discovers why Maine, United States, is called the 'lobster capital of the world'. Along the rugged coastline, he struggles to keep up with a team of lobster fisherwomen, dives for clams, harvests oysters, forages in freezing waters, and tests his lumberjack skills. Can he earn the status of a tough Mainer as he tests his culinary skills against local legend, chef Melissa Kelly, a two time James Beard award-winner?

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay: Uncharted
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay gets up close with rhinos, giraffes, zebras and hippos in the dramatic wilderness of KwaZulu-Natal, South Africa, as he learns the secrets of the traditional cuisine of Zulu warriors and masters using a local "braai". He leaps from a helicopter into the raging Indian Ocean, harvests mussels on treacherous rocks and immerses into the local township culture, before cooking with beloved local chef Zola Nene for a revered Zulu chief.

programme.title: Jane
programme.desc: Using a trove of never-before-seen footage, the film tells the story of Jane's early explorations and research in Tanzania, focusing on her groundbreaking field work, her relationship with her cameraman and husband Hugo van Lawick, and the chimpanzees that were the subject of her study.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest adventures.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest adventures.

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: Freddy and Summer like each other a lot. So much so it's affecting their playing. The Austin Music Festival is coming up and it is Dewey's life-long dream to play it. The band audition, but they don't make it. Dewey is very disappointed, but he discovers his old band will be playing. It seems like he has to make a choice between School of Rock and his old band. The band support him in chasing his dream and his wish may finally come true.

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: School of Rock is an American musical-comedy television series based on the 2003 film of the same name. A group of teenagers of the prestigious american school have a pretty predictable life, until one day totally changes everything. Once they get a substitute teacher Dewey Finn and he instructs Tomika, Freddy, Summer, Zack and Lawrence in the art of rock and roll. Mr Finn has his own view on the lesson structure and he gets across to the students easily so they become his huge fans at once. Thanks to Mr Finn the teens create a rock band and learn to play different instruments. Rock helps them to realize that in order to become successful they must learn how to work as a team, merge into one and leave any signs of egoistic behavior behind.

programme.title: Game Shakers
programme.desc: Babe and Kenzie are two, 12-year-old girls who create a mobile game that becomes the most popular game of the year. With the profits and their friend, Hudson, world – famous Rapper Double G, and his son, Triple G, the girls start their own supercool gaming company in Brooklyn. Now, Babe and Kenzie must keep their gaming business a success while still managing to get good grades. The show experience spans multiple platforms as viewers not only watch the gang's adventures, but play their latest creations on Nick.com, the Nick App and their mobile devices.

Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells about the ten year old boy Timmy that lives in the fictional town Dimmsdale where he has a hard time. His life is constantly miserable because his parents are rarely home, he is babysat by Vicky, a 16-year-old torturous babysitter, he is bullied daily, and is tormented by his teacher, Mr. Crocker. But everything changes when he receives two fairy godparents: Cosmo, his wife Wanda, and later their son, Poof. Timmy learns that his fairy godparents are capable of granting him any wish he wants within certain limits. However, Timmy's immature nature causes him to sometimes ask for wishes that unintentionally result in disaster.

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: Freddy is looking for a response from Summer after telling her how he feels. The band agrees to help Dewey save a local ice cream shop, but first have to get out of an escape room challenge Principal Mullins signed them up for.

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: 44 Cats is an Italian preschool animated television series about four kittens who create a musical group called the Buffycats. Lampo is the lead singer and guitarist, Milady is the bassist, Pilou is the drummer and Meatball is the keyboard player. The kittens live in the house of Granny Pina where they meet 40 other cats. Granny likes to cook her magic pasta that gives the Buffycats their special powers. Her old garage is turned into a club, where the kittens give concerts and polish up their musical talents. They are always enthusiastic and optimistic, ready to give a helping hand to other cats and kittens. The 44 Cats is inspired by a very popular Italian kids song, 44 Cats which became famous on children's song festival Zecchino d'Oro in 1968.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies
programme.desc: Gil, Molly, Bubble Puppy, Goby, Deema, Oona, Nonny and Zooli are a group of excitable mermaid and merman preschoolers. They teach important life lessons, as well as those of an academic kind through songs involving maths, science and literacy. Have fun and learn something new with the Bubble Guppies! Each has their own unique personality, which you will discover throughout the show... Gil is so quick and energetic, Molly is a natural born leader, and Deema is such a drama queen!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Fairy Axle City is inhabited by various cars: fast and slow, huge and tiny, careful and reckless. There is one thing they all have in common- their strong desire to compete. Brave Blaze is the superfast monster truck, the famous hero of Axle City. He has his friend who use special robot power to save the day. AJ is his 8-year-old driver, best friend and technology guru. Together they get to know how things work and master physics and mathematics, win all the races in the city. Their main rival is sly monster truck Crusher, he likes to cheat a lot and is ready for everything to become the winner on the track.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas
programme.desc: Capitán Santiago, his pet frog Kiko, cousin Tomás and mermaid friend Lorelai are the Pirate Protectors of Isla Encanto! And with his magic pirate ship El Bravo and enchanted tools, Santiago will lead his brave crew on quests across the high seas.

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: Follow Ryder and his team of trusty side-pups as they try their best to help keep Adventure Bay safe from mayhem and mischief. Alongside his service pups Marshall, Rubble, Chase, Zuma, Rocky and Skye, ten-year-old Ryder proudly leads the Paw Patrol team as they confront their rivals over in the neighbouring town of Foggy Bottom. Under the watch of an arrogant Mayor Humdinger, Foggy Bottom's local crew of pesky kitties love nothing more than eating candy and stirring up a little trouble for Ryder and his friends. Lucky for the citizens of Adventure Bay, "no job is too big and no pup is too small" for the team to handle, and whether navigating sea, land or sky, these mighty pups are ready to go, go, go!

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! And The Chipmunks
programme.desc: The series is an animated comedy about a single father named David Seville, who is raising three chipmunks. He can lose his patience sometimes, causing him to say ALVINNN!!! . The series takes place in modern times and discusses modern topics such as Dave's technology issues and school bullying. Others are parents embarrassing kids and parents needing dates.

programme.title: It's Pony
programme.desc: A normal girl's life is made extraordinary by her best friend – an unpredictable, outrageous, and hilarious talking pony. No matter the complications he causes, Annie knows that everything is better when Pony is around.

programme.title: It's Pony
programme.desc: When Annie finds a lost wallet, she's determined to return it to its owner and prove she's a good person. Annie and Pony get locked out of their building, and they can't seem to convince their neighbors to let them back in.

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures
programme.desc: Lego City Adventures is an American-Danish computer-animated TV series produced by The Lego Group. The series is set in the noisy sprawling LEGO City metropolis, where its down-to-earth characters live and work. Here you will meet the bravest firemen, the best policemen, the most attentive mayor and LEGO characters from all walks of life. They team up to stop a mysterious criminal, who causes troubles all around. Each LEGO City citizen can feel quite a hero and participate in the most amazing and unbelievable adventures in the city! If you find yourself there, you witness everyday incidents with a happy ending.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This children's cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincoln's best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincoln's abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincoln's oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Entertaining comedy series that follows the out-of-this-world adventures of the Thundermans, a family that has superpowers but try to live normal lives in the town of Hiddenville. The parents, Hank and Barb, used to be "Thunder Man" and "Electress", until they decided to retire and move to suburbs, in an attempt to live a normal life with their kids- ''Thunder Twins'' Phoebe, whose superpowers include telekinesis, heat breath and freeze breath and Max, who has the same powers but wants to become a super-villain, Billy who is super fast, Nora, who has laser eyes and Chloe, whose superpower is teleportation.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Young Dylan
programme.desc: Young Dylan's grandmother decides to send him to live indefinitely with her affluent son's family. The Wilson family household is soon turned upside down as lifestyles clash between aspiring hip hop star and his straight-laced cousins.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Young Dylan
programme.desc: Hilarious television series, created by Tyler Perry, that follows the life and adventures of a street-smart kid and aspiring hip-hop artist Young Dylan. When Dylan's grandmother Viola realizes that raising her grandson is too much to take on, she decides to send him to live indefinitely with her wealthy son Myles Wilson, his wife Yasmine and their two kids Rebecca and Charlie. Everyone will have to adapt to their ''new normal'', and they will get themselves in lots of hilarious situations along the way. Dylan will teach his cousins about ''swag'' and street smarts, but he will soon learn that even rappers have rules in the Wilson house.

programme.title: Nicky, Ricky, Dicky & Dawn
programme.desc: Nicky, Ricky, Dicky and Dawn are quadruplets with only two things in common: their birthday and parents. This dynamic foursome battle sibling rivalry at every turn, but in the end when they are together, nothing can stop them.

programme.title: Nicky, Ricky, Dicky & Dawn
programme.desc: Everyone with siblings knows that sibling rivalry is a real thing, so imagine the sibling rivalry between quadruplets. That's everyday life for the Harper quadruplets Nicky, Ricky, Dicky and Dawn.Whilst you might assume they get on well, these four siblings have absolutely nothing in common which normally leads to family fights. Although everyday life can be tough they have to learn to work together to solve the endless problems that they find themselves facing. Produced by Nickelodeon this lighthearted American comedy series is sure to have you fits of giggles.

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Entertaining comedy series that follows the out-of-this-world adventures of the Thundermans, a family that has superpowers but try to live normal lives in the town of Hiddenville. The parents, Hank and Barb, used to be "Thunder Man" and "Electress", until they decided to retire and move to suburbs, in an attempt to live a normal life with their kids- ''Thunder Twins'' Phoebe, whose superpowers include telekinesis, heat breath and freeze breath and Max, who has the same powers but wants to become a super-villain, Billy who is super fast, Nora, who has laser eyes and Chloe, whose superpower is teleportation.

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Entertaining comedy series that follows the out-of-this-world adventures of the Thundermans, a family that has superpowers but try to live normal lives in the town of Hiddenville. The parents, Hank and Barb, used to be "Thunder Man" and "Electress", until they decided to retire and move to suburbs, in an attempt to live a normal life with their kids- ''Thunder Twins'' Phoebe, whose superpowers include telekinesis, heat breath and freeze breath and Max, who has the same powers but wants to become a super-villain, Billy who is super fast, Nora, who has laser eyes and Chloe, whose superpower is teleportation.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Side Hustle
programme.desc: Presley, Lex, and Munchy are excited when they get a karaoke machine from their favorite show, Karaoke Kickoff. But the machine breaks almost immediately. The kids head to the studio to get their money back and uncover an even bigger scam.

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Entertaining comedy series that follows the out-of-this-world adventures of the Thundermans, a family that has superpowers but try to live normal lives in the town of Hiddenville. The parents, Hank and Barb, used to be "Thunder Man" and "Electress", until they decided to retire and move to suburbs, in an attempt to live a normal life with their kids- ''Thunder Twins'' Phoebe, whose superpowers include telekinesis, heat breath and freeze breath and Max, who has the same powers but wants to become a super-villain, Billy who is super fast, Nora, who has laser eyes and Chloe, whose superpower is teleportation.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This children's cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincoln's best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincoln's abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincoln's oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Ever wonder what it's like to grow up in a big family? Eleven-year-old Lincoln Loud gives viewers an inside look at how to survive the chaos of a huge household, especially as the only boy with ten sisters!

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: After a pun-filled trip to the grocery store with Luan and Lola, Dad worries Lola thinks he plays favorites. When Lynn's friend Margo is celebrated for a one-ina-million soccer goal, Lynn has to try and be supportive.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest adventures.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea spong Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: Pa priecīgā kartupeļa pēdām
programme.desc: 7.epizode. Gvido Kakliauskas un Gundars Bojārs ceļo pa Peru džungļiem, kalniem un apdzīvotām vietām, meklējot dažādos kartupeļus.

programme.title: Mēs?
programme.desc: Grandioza 20. gs. Beigu vēsturisko pārmaiņu laikā veidota dokumentāla filma piecās daļās. Tā parāda Padomju Savienību pirms tās sairšanas laikā no 1987.- 1989. gadam. Filmā redzam pirmās neatkarības demonstrācijas Latvijā, nemierus Uzbekistānā, zemestrīcē izdzīvojušos Armēnijā, streikojošos strādniekus Jeroslavļā, bijušo iedzīvotāju atgriešanos Černobiļā, Gorbačova konfliktu ar Jeļcinu. Šī filma dod unikālu iespēju vērot un vērtēt notikumus nevis no ārzemju tūrista vai žurnālista acīm, bet no "iekšpuses".

programme.title: Meža sarunas
programme.desc: Klīves iecirkņa mežkopis Gunārs Blūms atklās sava darba specifiku, hobijus un to, kas viņam liek būt nemitīgā kustībā. Kā saka Gunāra kolēģis: "Gunārs nevar bez meža un mežs nevar bez Gunāra."

programme.title: Nedēļa Latvijā
programme.desc: Atkārtojums. Par aizvadītās nedēļas svarīgākajiem notikumiem Latvijas novados.

programme.title: Шефы
programme.desc: Мини-сериал рассказывает о шеф-поваре знаменитого французского заведения, готовом пойти на всё ради спасения собственного ресторана. А также, о его отношениях с другими людьми, в полностью неполиткорректном мире…

programme.title: Euronews
programme.desc: Свежие репортажи из разных уголков Европы помогут зрителям Первого канала ориентироваться в водовороте бурной европейской жизни

programme.title: Реальная мистика
programme.desc: Огромному количеству людей приходилось сталкиваться с проявлением необъяснимого и сверхъестественного, однако в большинстве случаев найти рациональный ответ на произошедшую ситуацию не удавалось никому. Докудрама "Реальная мистика" ставит перед собой амбициозную задачу: разгадать, на первый взгляд, абсолютно загадочные и мистические явления. Герои "Реальной мистики" – простые зрители, столкнувшиеся с необъяснимым в своей жизни. Ведущий документального реалити актер Андрей Дебрин вместе с командой помощников будет проводить расследование самых запутанных историй, которые происходят в мире: НЛО, гадания, привороты, аномальные зоны и многим другим и выяснят, что на самом деле за ними стоит.

programme.title: Участковый
programme.desc: "Новоселки" – сленговое название микрорайона на окраине столицы, в котором процветает преступность. Местные жители так привыкли к такому положению вещей, что кажется, уже никто и никогда не сможет заставить их поверить в силы правосудия. Но жизнь микрорайона меняется с приездом нового участкового Сергея Громова, бывшего старшего следователя убойного отдела... Сергей не любит вспоминать о своем прошлом, но работа оперативника научила его мгновенно оценивать ситуацию и принимать решения. Он не будет разгадывать ребусы свершившихся злодеяний, его задача – работа на опережение преступников…

programme.title: Морские дьяволы. Смерч
programme.desc: Их называют "морскими дьяволами", хотя по праву их можно считать рыцарями трех стихий: они действуют на земле, в воде и в воздухе. Захватывающий боевик "Морские дьяволы" посвящен спецназовцам ВМФ России, всем боевым пловцам — тем, кто является элитой наших вооруженных сил. Все имена и боевые псевдонимы в сериале вымышлены, отряд под таким названием никогда не существовал, но такие подразделения существуют на самом деле, и их подвигами страна вправе гордиться!

programme.title: Улетное видео по-русски
programme.desc: Улетное видео по-русски – это сборник самых смешных и невероятных видео со всей планеты. В каждом выпуске представлены смешные падения людей, а также глупые поступки и нелепые ситуации в которые они попадают. Все серии улетного видео также не обошлись без обаятельных и неповторимых животных. Лучшее видео с любимыми котиками, смешным собаками и сотнями представителей дикой и домашней фауны, также собраны в одной передаче. Если смотреть улетное видео по-русски, то можно смело забыть о плохом настроении, ведь герои передачи заставят рассмеяться даже самого грустного зрителя. Все серии шоу пропитаны искрометным юмором, смешными шутками и невероятными кадрами. Помимо этого в шоу собраны редкие записи природных катаклизмов, сумасшедших везений и еще много-много все.

programme.title: Пападос-шоу
programme.desc: Юмористическая телепрограмма подарит телезрителям массу эмоций — от восторга до испуга. В каждом выпуске телешоу "Пападос шоу" собраны розыгрыши, снятые скрытой камерой в разных странах мира. Это нестандартные ситуации, вызывающие неожиданную реакцию прохожих. Камера фиксирует, как реагируют люди разного возраста на унитаз или душевую кабину в лифте, труп на улице или пленника в багажнике машины. Ведущие предлагают повторить пранки, а автор лучшего видео может получить приз от программы.

programme.title: Документальный проект
programme.desc: Самые шокирующие гипотезы" – документальный проект телеканала РЕН ТВ. Мы дадим новые ответы на старые вопросы и зададим свои. Факты, о которых долго молчали наши коллеги-журналисты и независимая оценка событий, изменивших мир; расследования самых сенсационных историй и свежий взгляд на, казалось бы, общеизвестные исторические факты; поиск закономерностей и параллелей в самых невероятных явлениях нашей жизни, новости из всех областей человеческих знаний и загадки потаённых уголков нашего подсознания. Всё, что вас так долго интересовало, и всё, что может коснуться каждого из нас.

programme.title: Detention Adventure
programme.desc: With a similar premise to The Goonies and The Breakfast Club, Detention Adventure follows three nerdy friends and the school bully, who repeatedly get themselves thrown in detention. However, they have good reason to do this as they are trying to find the entrance to a secret maze of tunnels filled with hidden traps that protect the legendary laboratory of Alexander Graham Bell. Raign (Simone Miller), Joy (Alina Prijono), and Hulk (Jack Fulton) are the three whip-smart geeks who discover an old textbook which points them to Bell's lab, conveniently hidden beneath their school. The school bully, Brett (Tomaso Sanelli) a detention regular, soons joins them as they use all of their attributes to try to navigate through the labyrinth and find hidden passageways to lead them to their goal.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animals
programme.desc: Incredible nature documentary series in which Andy Day, a famous English presenter, shows children a variety of baby animals from different locations around the world. Andy will tell you some interesting stories and you will have a chance to discover some surprising facts. Each episode is themed around a different behaviour that baby animals have to learn in order to survive, such as walking, climbing, jumping, swimming, eating, making friends, and many more important skills.

programme.title: History Hunters
programme.desc: History Hunters documentary series let young viewers explore past civilizations and cultures, their heritage and its influence on future generations. It is a fun way for both parents and kids to learn history and discover its mysterious facts and events. Various chapters of history are there for you: from exploration of Vikings, including their myths, alphabet and foods, to the Mayan civilization, the culture of Europe's wide-ranging clans of Celts and life in the islands in the Pacific Ocean known collectively as Polynesia, and much more.

programme.title: Science Max: Experiments at Large
programme.desc: Science Max: Experiments at Large is a Canadian children's TV series, hosted by Phil McCordic. The aim is to educate viewers about science through various experiments and to demonstrate main scientific principles in a fun and entertaining way. There is an interactive online component in the show, kids are welcome to interact with the host and ask him science questions. Kids will find out how gravity works, what polymers are, why boomerangs come back and much more. When it comes to scientific experiments, everything is large, as Phil likes to go bigger to make it more entertaining for the viewers.

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Re-telling history in a way you never have before, Horrible History shows the dark and gruesome aspects of British and other Western world history. Ranging from the Stone Age to post-World War II era, the show presents the history with several time periods in a single episode, with live action sketches and music videos intercut by animations and quizzes. Starring Matthew Baynton, Simon Farnaby, Martha Howe-Douglas, Jim Howick, Laurence Rickard, Sarah Hadland and Ben Willbond with a large supporting cast, this British children's live-action historical and musical sketch comedy is based on the bestselling books of the same name by Terry Deary, adapted for CBBC. Running from 2009 to 2013, Horrible Histories doesn't set out to educate younger audiences but instead popularise history and inspire curiosity for further investigation into history.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures
programme.desc: In one of the biggest safari parks in the whole world there is Ranger Andy, who will go off in his truest mobile- buggy to fix the problem. He is not alone with help from his Boss, Mr Hammond and Tech superstar Jen who know everything about computer. They are here to help all of the animal from the small and cute to the big and scary that you wouldn't normally get too close to. Everyday there is a new problem that need solving by Andy all around the whole world. Come a long on this epic journey of Adventure and learning about your favourite animal along the way.

programme.title: MathXplosion
programme.desc: Mathemagician' Eric Leclerc shares secrets from the not-so-hidden world of math in this exciting, entertaining math-short series, proving math really is everywhere! In each episode, Eric illuminates the big ideas in primary math that children are already learning to do. From computation, to patterns in a number sequence, to shapes and space, and measurement, mathXplosion highlights how math is related and connected to things they see, know, and wonder about in their daily lives. mathXplosion aims to grow and foster a love of math in a fun, funny, and approachable way!

programme.title: The Planets
programme.desc: This stunningly ambitious series brings to life the most memorable events in the history of the solar system, by using groundbreaking visual effects to tell the thrilling story of all eight planets. Transporting you to the surface of these dynamic worlds to witness the moments of high drama that shaped each one, The Planets reveals how the latest science allows us to unlock their past lives.

programme.title: Gym Stars
programme.desc: Watch some of Britain's youngest gym stars at the top of their game. See loses and wins, injuries and successes and a team with some of the best strength and agility to represent their country worldwide. Go with the elite team to seem them aganist some of the best gymnasts in Europe in intense competitions using the pole vault and even trampolining. And look into the life of a gymnast behind the scenes and away from their professonal sport. The show will take you to visit the homes the gymnasts live in, the routines they do each day and their personal life away from their professional.

programme.title: Hero Squad
programme.desc: Six children are transformed into Hero Squad cadets and undergo a rigorous training programme alongside real life-savers. Under the watchful eye of presenter Rav Wilding and closely supervised by experienced mentors, these six wannabe heroes have the experience of a lifetime. In just 48 hours, the Hero Squad cadets have to learn the skills and techniques to cope with a "real life" rescue scenario.

programme.title: Baby Animals
programme.desc: Arctic foxes, sea otters, tamarin monkeys and red pandas are just some of the tiniest, cutest creatures featured in Baby Animals. With their big eyes and wobbly first steps, nature's newbies are irresistible. Watch how animals nurture their young as infant elephants, baby bison and rambunctious rhinos all eat, sleep and play their way to adulthood. Cuddly, clumsy and full of mischief, the babies of the animal kingdom certainly make up the wildest daycare you've ever seen.

programme.title: The Mystery Files
programme.desc: A little bit of mystery makes history a lot more fun. Join cousins E.B and Kyla, as they unwrap the clues left for them by the mysterious Great Aunt Hermione and every Mystery File leads to a new adventure! The Sherlockian duo have inherited the mixed-up files of Great Aunt Hermione, explorer extraordinaire. Each file presents three seemingly unrelated objects from the past, and it's up to the gang to figure out how these artifacts connect to who we are and how we live now. Each mystery unravels new discoveries from around the world, like: How has the invention of flight changed the "size" of our world? Did the Vikings set foot in North America hundreds of years before any other Europeans? Are the undead real? And how does the way we measure time change the way we live?

programme.title: Science Max: Experiments at Large
programme.desc: Science Max: Experiments at Large is a Canadian children's TV series, hosted by Phil McCordic. The aim is to educate viewers about science through various experiments and to demonstrate main scientific principles in a fun and entertaining way. There is an interactive online component in the show, kids are welcome to interact with the host and ask him science questions. Kids will find out how gravity works, what polymers are, why boomerangs come back and much more. When it comes to scientific experiments, everything is large, as Phil likes to go bigger to make it more entertaining for the viewers.

programme.title: Andy's Dinosaur Adventures
programme.desc: Andy Day is on a Jurassic mission to explore the lost world of the dinosaurs in this children's series. Using his unique, time-travelling clock, he ventures back to prehistoric times, when these gigantic animals ruled the forests, plains, oceans and skies. Helping him along the way is trusted friend Hatty, a dinosaur expert and palaeontologist, who prepares exhibits in the dinosaur section of the National Museum. Though caring and thoughtful, Andy's mishaps and accidents at the museum are often the reason for his time-travelling antics, as he must replace any broken items before Hatty's exhibits open.

programme.title: Detention Adventure
programme.desc: With a similar premise to The Goonies and The Breakfast Club, Detention Adventure follows three nerdy friends and the school bully, who repeatedly get themselves thrown in detention. However, they have good reason to do this as they are trying to find the entrance to a secret maze of tunnels filled with hidden traps that protect the legendary laboratory of Alexander Graham Bell. Raign (Simone Miller), Joy (Alina Prijono), and Hulk (Jack Fulton) are the three whip-smart geeks who discover an old textbook which points them to Bell's lab, conveniently hidden beneath their school. The school bully, Brett (Tomaso Sanelli) a detention regular, soons joins them as they use all of their attributes to try to navigate through the labyrinth and find hidden passageways to lead them to their goal.

programme.title: Xploration DIY Sci
programme.desc: Steve Spangler is an American television personality, author, science teacher and the host of Xploration DIY SCI show. Each episode is about a certain science concept strengthened by science experiments, so that theory and practice are integrated. Steve conducts his fun experiments using everyday items everybody can get, so anyone can be a scientist. Watch, have fun and learn about the power of pressure, power of gas, laws of inertia, how to make elephant toothpaste at home and much more.

programme.title: MathXplosion
programme.desc: Mathemagician' Eric Leclerc shares secrets from the not-so-hidden world of math in this exciting, entertaining math-short series, proving math really is everywhere! In each episode, Eric illuminates the big ideas in primary math that children are already learning to do. From computation, to patterns in a number sequence, to shapes and space, and measurement, mathXplosion highlights how math is related and connected to things they see, know, and wonder about in their daily lives. mathXplosion aims to grow and foster a love of math in a fun, funny, and approachable way!

programme.title: Junior Bake Off
programme.desc: This is a version of the Great British Bake Off, except in this series, the contestants are all aged between nine and fifteen years. They will compete over 15 episodes, trying to make the best bread, biscuits, and cake, all manner of baked goods, in fact. At the end of the 15 weeks, one of the twenty original contestants will be crowned the winner. But who has got what it takes? Comedian Harry Hill presents, with Liam Charles and Prue Leith as the judges. Each week, there will be a technical test, followed by a "Showstopper" round, in which contestants are encouraged to get creative and create more individual bakes, with little guidelines. In the technical, however, they have to follow a recipe and produce bakes in a more uniform manner.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures
programme.desc: In one of the biggest safari parks in the whole world there is Ranger Andy, who will go off in his truest mobile- buggy to fix the problem. He is not alone with help from his Boss, Mr Hammond and Tech superstar Jen who know everything about computer. They are here to help all of the animal from the small and cute to the big and scary that you wouldn't normally get too close to. Everyday there is a new problem that need solving by Andy all around the whole world. Come a long on this epic journey of Adventure and learning about your favourite animal along the way.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animals
programme.desc: Incredible nature documentary series in which Andy Day, a famous English presenter, shows children a variety of baby animals from different locations around the world. Andy will tell you some interesting stories and you will have a chance to discover some surprising facts. Each episode is themed around a different behaviour that baby animals have to learn in order to survive, such as walking, climbing, jumping, swimming, eating, making friends, and many more important skills.

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Re-telling history in a way you never have before, Horrible History shows the dark and gruesome aspects of British and other Western world history. Ranging from the Stone Age to post-World War II era, the show presents the history with several time periods in a single episode, with live action sketches and music videos intercut by animations and quizzes. Starring Matthew Baynton, Simon Farnaby, Martha Howe-Douglas, Jim Howick, Laurence Rickard, Sarah Hadland and Ben Willbond with a large supporting cast, this British children's live-action historical and musical sketch comedy is based on the bestselling books of the same name by Terry Deary, adapted for CBBC. Running from 2009 to 2013, Horrible Histories doesn't set out to educate younger audiences but instead popularise history and inspire curiosity for further investigation into history.

programme.title: Deadly Pole to Pole
programme.desc: Deadly Pole to Pole is a documentary series hosted by Steve Backshall, who travels pole to pole through the Americas while looking for the most dangerous animals. Join Steve and his deadliest adventure- 14-month voyage from the Arctic to the Antarctic via Alaska, California, Hawaii, Mexico and Brazil and many more amazing locations. Have a look at his meetings with white whales, ice bears, sharks, eagles, wolves, sea lions, eagles, crocodiles, snakes and spiders.

programme.title: The Mystery Files
programme.desc: A little bit of mystery makes history a lot more fun. Join cousins E.B and Kyla, as they unwrap the clues left for them by the mysterious Great Aunt Hermione and every Mystery File leads to a new adventure! The Sherlockian duo have inherited the mixed-up files of Great Aunt Hermione, explorer extraordinaire. Each file presents three seemingly unrelated objects from the past, and it's up to the gang to figure out how these artifacts connect to who we are and how we live now. Each mystery unravels new discoveries from around the world, like: How has the invention of flight changed the "size" of our world? Did the Vikings set foot in North America hundreds of years before any other Europeans? Are the undead real? And how does the way we measure time change the way we live?

programme.title: History Hunters
programme.desc: History Hunters documentary series let young viewers explore past civilizations and cultures, their heritage and its influence on future generations. It is a fun way for both parents and kids to learn history and discover its mysterious facts and events. Various chapters of history are there for you: from exploration of Vikings, including their myths, alphabet and foods, to the Mayan civilization, the culture of Europe's wide-ranging clans of Celts and life in the islands in the Pacific Ocean known collectively as Polynesia, and much more.

programme.title: Baby Animals
programme.desc: Arctic foxes, sea otters, tamarin monkeys and red pandas are just some of the tiniest, cutest creatures featured in Baby Animals. With their big eyes and wobbly first steps, nature's newbies are irresistible. Watch how animals nurture their young as infant elephants, baby bison and rambunctious rhinos all eat, sleep and play their way to adulthood. Cuddly, clumsy and full of mischief, the babies of the animal kingdom certainly make up the wildest daycare you've ever seen.

programme.title: Hero Squad
programme.desc: Six children are transformed into Hero Squad cadets and undergo a rigorous training programme alongside real life-savers. Under the watchful eye of presenter Rav Wilding and closely supervised by experienced mentors, these six wannabe heroes have the experience of a lifetime. In just 48 hours, the Hero Squad cadets have to learn the skills and techniques to cope with a "real life" rescue scenario.

programme.title: Science Max: Experiments at Large
programme.desc: Science Max: Experiments at Large is a Canadian children's TV series, hosted by Phil McCordic. The aim is to educate viewers about science through various experiments and to demonstrate main scientific principles in a fun and entertaining way. There is an interactive online component in the show, kids are welcome to interact with the host and ask him science questions. Kids will find out how gravity works, what polymers are, why boomerangs come back and much more. When it comes to scientific experiments, everything is large, as Phil likes to go bigger to make it more entertaining for the viewers.

programme.title: Gym Stars
programme.desc: Watch some of Britain's youngest gym stars at the top of their game. See loses and wins, injuries and successes and a team with some of the best strength and agility to represent their country worldwide. Go with the elite team to seem them aganist some of the best gymnasts in Europe in intense competitions using the pole vault and even trampolining. And look into the life of a gymnast behind the scenes and away from their professonal sport. The show will take you to visit the homes the gymnasts live in, the routines they do each day and their personal life away from their professional.

programme.title: Andy's Dinosaur Adventures

programme.title: The Planets
programme.desc: This stunningly ambitious series brings to life the most memorable events in the history of the solar system, by using groundbreaking visual effects to tell the thrilling story of all eight planets. Transporting you to the surface of these dynamic worlds to witness the moments of high drama that shaped each one, The Planets reveals how the latest science allows us to unlock their past lives.

Running from 2009 to 2013, Horrible Histories doesn't set out to educate younger audiences but instead popularise history and inspire curiosity for further investigation into history.

programme.title: SmartMix
programme.desc: The smartest mix of the best music available through the night! Just turn it on!

programme.title: Copes garša
programme.desc: Cope ir hobijs, bauda, prieks, emociju gamma no veiksmes līdz neveiksmei un atkal otrādi. Tā ved ārpus mājas, dabā, tā sagādā piedzīvojumus vienatnē vai kopā ar draugiem, tā rosina sajūtas, atpūtina ķermeni un prātu un bagātina dzīves "garšu"! "Copes Garša" ir informatīvi izglītojošs raidījums internetā Youtube kanālā, Facebook profilā un makšķernieku foruma mājaslapā copeslietas.lv. Raidījuma "Copes Garša" mērķis ir ar makšķernieku sabiedrībā zināmu sportistu paraugu popularizēt makšķerēšanu kā mūsdienīga, aktīva un veselīga dzīvesveida sastāvdaļu un aizraujošu sporta aktivitāti, vienlaikus piesaistot attiecīgos speciālistus, informēt un izglītot Latvijas makšķerniekus, sevišķi jauno paaudzi, par atbildīgas, saimnieciskas, saudzīgas un ilgstpējīgas zivju resursu izmantošanas pamatprincipiem, dabas aizsardzību un līdzdalību tās resursu saglabāšanā un atjaunošanā.

programme.title: Drifta sacensības – RedBull Car Park Drift
Комиссар Мегрэ
programme.desc: Встречайте самого известного в мире полицейского с трубкой – Жюля Мегрэ. Вот уже много лет он раскрывает запутанные преступления – одно за другим – словно разгадывает головоломки. Да так, что оторваться просто невозможно. В предлагаемом вам французском сериале по произведениям Жоржа Сименона есть всё – фирменная атмосфера тайны, загадки, авторы которых совсем не против навсегда остаться в тени, и, конечно же, гениальный сыщик, великолепно воплощённый на экране Бруно Кремером, словно рождённым для этой роли... За свою долгую карьеру Мегрэ приходилось расследовать преступления во всех концах Европы, и его репутация известна далеко за пределами Франции.

programme.title: Вишенка на новогоднем торте
programme.desc: Аманда уверена – с мужчинами всегда все слишком сложно! Ее подруга считает, что Аманде пора остепениться и сделать, наконец, окончательный выбор, а психоаналитик ставит ей неутешительный диагноз: "Мадам-катастрофа", которая убивает все свои романы, едва они начинают стремиться к обручальным кольцам. Но даже женщина, которая упорно отказывается стать счастливой, не застрахована от случая. Само провидение ставит точку в ее сомнениях, словно кладет последнюю вишенку на торт.

programme.title: Постановка
programme.desc: Из-за пандемии коронавируса актеры Вест-Эндского театра временно остались без работы в изоляции. Но чтобы не терять форму и не сходить с ума из-за происходящего в мире, они решают продолжать репетиции удаленно, что иногда становится причиной комических и абсурдных ситуаций.

programme.title: Миллионеры
programme.desc: Эпифания – избалованная наследница миллионного состояния, по воли отца, может выйти замуж только за того, кто сможет превратить 500 фунтов в 15000 фунтов стерлингов за короткое время. Её миллионы прельщают многих мужчин, но происходит случайная встреча с бедным индийским доктором, и миллионерша не может думать ни о ком другом. Только есть два "но": первое, доктор не обращает на неё внимание; второе, по воли матери, он может женится лишь на той, кто сможет прожить три месяца потратив только 35 шиллингов.

programme.title: Гамлет ХХI век
programme.desc: История Гамлета, принца Датского, перенесенная в XXI век. Героям придется решать все те же нравственные проблемы и преодолевать те же трудности, но средствами сегодняшнего дня. Вместо дуэлей на шпагах – гонка, вместо писем – видеопослания, вместо классического саундтрека – композиции Deep Purple.

programme.title: Комиссар Мегрэ
programme.desc: Встречайте самого известного в мире полицейского с трубкой – Жюля Мегрэ. Вот уже много лет он раскрывает запутанные преступления – одно за другим – словно разгадывает головоломки. Да так, что оторваться просто невозможно. В предлагаемом вам французском сериале по произведениям Жоржа Сименона есть всё – фирменная атмосфера тайны, загадки, авторы которых совсем не против навсегда остаться в тени, и, конечно же, гениальный сыщик, великолепно воплощённый на экране Бруно Кремером, словно рождённым для этой роли... За свою долгую карьеру Мегрэ приходилось расследовать преступления во всех концах Европы, и его репутация известна далеко за пределами Франции.

programme.title: Холостяк
programme.desc: Комедия, Италия, Испания. 1956 / Паоло Анзельми, убеждённый холостяк, считает, что брак стеснит его свободу. После того как его друг Армандо женился, Паоло переезжает из их общей квартиры в небольшой пансионат и знакомится с молодой хозяйкой Габриэлой. Между ними завязываются серьёзные отношения, продолжающиеся до тех пор, пока она не заговаривает о женитьбе. Вырвавшись на свободу, Паоло бросается c головой в новые любовные приключения, но в конце концов разочаровывается во всём и чувствует себя одиноким. Кроме того и мать Паоло настаивает на его женитьбе. Но у всех возможных кандидаток есть какие-то недостатки: ревность, многочисленная родня, слишком болтливы. Но вот на его пути встречается Карла...

programme.title: Постановка
programme.desc: Из-за пандемии коронавируса актеры Вест-Эндского театра временно остались без работы в изоляции. Но чтобы не терять форму и не сходить с ума из-за происходящего в мире, они решают продолжать репетиции удаленно, что иногда становится причиной комических и абсурдных ситуаций.

programme.title: Прекрасная эпоха
programme.desc: Что, если бы Вы могли отправиться в любое время в прошлом по своему выбору? Именно такую услугу предоставляет компания, которая готова скрупулёзно восстановить детали любой эпохи на заказ. Одним из ее клиентов становится талантливый художник, переживающий кризис в отношениях с любимой женой. Он использует этот шанс, чтобы снова пережить тот день, когда много лет назад он встретил любовь всей своей жизни.

programme.title: Афера в Майами
programme.desc: Кубинское правительство направляет в Майами своих шпионов для предотвращения терактов, организуемых враждебными группировками. Но агенты под прикрытием не только успешно исполняют свою миссию, но и оказываются втянуты в подпольную торговлю кокаином, что грозит мировым скандалом.

programme.title: Комиссар Мегрэ
programme.desc: Встречайте самого известного в мире полицейского с трубкой – Жюля Мегрэ. Вот уже много лет он раскрывает запутанные преступления – одно за другим – словно разгадывает головоломки.
